thread.title: Very good 3star boutique Paris hotel
thread.title_full: Very good 3star boutique Paris hotel - Review of Jack's Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: uchao
title: Very good 3star boutique Paris hotel
text:
The reception ladies during the day and the male staff at reception during the evenings were all friendly, welcoming and professional. This is a very nice, great value, 3 star boutique hotel in the happening 13th Paris district. Located near Place d'Italie, it is well connected for public transport. In the 13th district, there are plenty of restaurants, and many are NOT the tourist traps typical of central Paris. The rooms are normal Parisien size, but rooms 203 & 303 are supposedly larger, we were told by a lady in reception. We had room 001 - the only ground floor room that is right next to the little breakfast room; but no noise of breakfast as there are 2 doors going into room 001. The advantage is we never needed to use the single, tiny Paris-style lift! Breakfast was croissants, danish pastries, jams, honey & nutella spreads, salami, yoghourts, bread rolls, tea & coffee, cereals, canned fruit salad and on 1 morning boiled eggs. Apart from the canned fruit salad, all items mentioned were good quality. Wished there were french baguette but had to make do with bread rolls. Breakfast room was nicely designed, small & cute. Our bathroom in room 001 was big for Parisien hotels, and had a walk-in shower, toilet and basin. Everything in the room and common areas were clean & new. Nothing shabby or worn. And no smells either! We would definitely book a room here again when we next come to Paris.
